data.instructions:
## Session M9OoO Complete - Comprehensive Handoff

### Session Summary
- **Branch:** `claude/accept-handoff-session-M9OoO`
- **Duration:** Short session focused on tool health
- **Primary Work:** Bug fixes for GoT CLI tooling

### Completed This Session

1. **Accepted Handoff H-20251226-163126-643642ea** from Sprint S-026 (Schema Validation Hardening)
   - Previous session completed 6/7 tasks (85.7%)
   - Remaining: T-20251226-141441-08b2860f (Consolidate Sprint ID format - low priority)

2. **Fixed Critical Bug: ThoughtEdge.id AttributeError** (5e3547e8)
   - `got validate` command was broken
   - Root cause: `ThoughtEdge` dataclass has no `.id` attribute
   - Fix: Use `f"{edge.source_id}->{edge.target_id}"` as edge identifier
   - All tests pass (18 smoke, 855 GoT tests)

3. **Fixed CLI: Added stdin support for handoff instructions**
   - `--instructions -` now reads from stdin
   - Prevents need for direct file editing (which corrupts checksums)

### System Health After Fixes
- Tasks: 153 (132 completed, 21 pending)
- Edges: 185
- Orphan nodes: 21 (12.3%)
- All validations pass

### High Priority Pending Tasks (Recommended Next)

| Task ID | Title | Notes |
|---------|-------|-------|
| T-20251226-132353-68a469de | Fix VersionedStore race condition | Concurrency issue |
| T-20251226-144811-8c95da24 | Investigate homeostasis_stability | Woven Mind benchmark |
| T-20251226-144757-f13543d6 | Investigate baseline_drift benchmark | Woven Mind benchmark |
| T-20251226-164253-01975923 | Validate descriptive GoT commit messages | Meta: commit quality |

### Files Modified This Session
- `cortical/got/cli/query.py` - Fixed ThoughtEdge.id bug (lines 158-168)
- `cortical/got/cli/handoff.py` - Added stdin support for instructions

### Key Commands for Next Session
```bash
# Restore context
python scripts/got_utils.py validate      # Verify health
python scripts/got_utils.py dashboard     # Overview
python scripts/got_utils.py task list --status pending  # See work

# Create handoffs with stdin
cat instructions.txt | python scripts/got_utils.py handoff initiate TASK_ID --target agent --instructions -
```

### Notes
- Tools are healthy and improved
- Good test coverage maintained
- Sprint S-026 work is largely complete
